roadshow.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a group of people who travel around the country entertaining the public, advertising, or providing a service
roadshow.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a series of meetings in different places organized by a company trying to raise money for investment in order to show its plans to possible investors
roadshow.translation[1].definitions[0].e: During the roadshow we visited 40 cities and talked to about 900 international investors.
